mapper.select: select count(*) from smart_village_topic where user_id in (select user_id from sys_user_depart where dep_id in (select id from sys_depart as depart1 where depart1.business_parent_id in (select id from sys_depart as depart2 where depart2.depart_name = #{name}))) and status = 1
select count(*) from sys_announcement where msg_category = #{type} and del_flag = 0
select count(*) from smart_verify_task where task_type = "执行第一形态人" and flow_status = 1
select count(*) from sys_announcement_send as send left join sys_announcement as fabu on send.annt_id = fabu.id where send.read_flag = 1 and fabu.msg_category = 1 and fabu.del_flag = 0
select count(*) from sys_announcement_send as send left join sys_announcement as fabu on send.annt_id = fabu.id where send.read_flag = 0 and fabu.msg_category = 1 and fabu.del_flag = 0
select count(*) from sys_announcement_send as send left join sys_announcement as fabu on send.annt_id = fabu.id where send.read_flag = 1 and fabu.msg_category = 2 and fabu.del_flag = 0
select count(*) from sys_announcement_send as send left join sys_announcement as fabu on send.annt_id = fabu.id where send.read_flag = 0 and fabu.msg_category = 2 and fabu.del_flag = 0
select count(*) from sys_announcement_send as send left join sys_announcement as fabu on send.annt_id = fabu.id where fabu.msg_category = 3 and fabu.del_flag = 0
select count(*) from smart_verify_task where flow_status = 2
select count(*) from smart_verify_task where flow_status = 1 or flow_status = 0
select realname,join_party_date from sys_user where del_flag = 0 and status = 1 and join_party_date like concat(concat('%',#{partyDate}),'%') and people_type = 1
select perms from sys_permission where perms like concat(concat('%',#{permsPrefix}),'%') and del_flag=0 and status='1'

select DISTINCT perms from sys_user_role sur, sys_role_permission srp, sys_permission sp where sur.role_id = srp.role_id and sp.id = srp.permission_id and sur.user_id = #{userId} and sp.perms like concat(concat('%',#{permsPrefix}),'%')
